Tenziesweb app

ReactJS

GitHub Repo Live version

Dice rolling simulation where user rolls and can hold dice at value until they all match. This was a simply application to practice {useState, useEffect} It is heavily reliant on the ability to write functions and tie them to React Event Listeners. The homepage utilizes Flexbox for the layout. It was built as one of the group projects of Scrimba's Frontend Developer Career Path.

This was the last group project of the Scrimba React Basics so at this point I was feeling pretty confident with the assignment. If I was to revisit this I think I would probably use SetTimeout to add some difficulty as well as maybe track rolls and disable rolling after so many tries.

rawledjuglal@gmail.com
